1 got, he was like, excuse me for a minute and he just left the room.
2 MP: Okay, so that's once. When was the other time?
3 Like during the thing, like when I was massaging his boobs.
4 MP: When you..okay, when you were massaging his boobs, was his back flat on the table? How was he positioned?
5 Well, he was at first and then when he started to whack off, he got like, his back went off the table, kind of like leaning...
6 MP: Okay, where were you standing?
7 I was standing up. I was not on him. I was standing up (inaudible) and I was like....he was towards, okay, he was on the table. I'm right here and he's leaning that way.
8 MP: Okay.
9 ..like (inaudible) cause I guess, I don't know, but... and he was like, my face, it got hard to see what was going on because of how low I was and he just kind of moved his head the other way and he was like, wants....
10 MP: Okay, but just now, when you're saying that, you moved your hand. Did you see him whacking off?
11 Yes. I saw him whacking off.
12 MP: Okay. That's what I need to know. Cause you said he whacked off twice.
13 Um hm.
14 MP: So he whacked off in front of you?
15 Um hm.
16 MP: And you saw his hand doing or you saw his eyes, what was going on?
Page 31 of 43
